full_text: Page 1417 Re: Draft language From Ray Ormond To Hugh Hurwitz Date 2019/08/12 06:01 Subject: Re: Draft language Attachments: TEXT.htm Will do. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> Date: 8/12/19 5:31 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Ray Ormond [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> Subject: Fwd: Draft language >>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/12/2019 05:31 >>> In addition to details on those two staff, please pull total staffing info, number vacancies, AWOL, long term leave, etc. Also, status of curr Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone ------- Original message ------- From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] OAG [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @usdoj.gov> Date: 8/11/19 11:12 AM (GMT-05:00) To: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> Subject: RF: Draft language >>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] OAG" 08/11/2019 23:12 >>> Thanks. This is helpful. We can talk tomorrow about the timing. It will also be helpful to get some information about staffing at MCC I've seen additional press reports trying to link the staffing shortages, overtime and Thanks, [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] From: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 9:53 PM To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] OAG [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @jmd.usdoj.gov> Cc: Ray Ormond [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] @bop.gov> Subject: Draft language [b(6); (b)(7)(C)] is discussed, several options are below. Please note that we should discuss timing of all this. I will need to ensure staff are notified first, and I shoul [b(5)] Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone Page 6064 DOJ-OGR-00025575
